languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс-передатчик{/g} в Санктум Навис улавливает шорох одежд, священные песнопения и металлические щелчки {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантов{/g}. Затем спокойный голос {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Леди-Навигатора{/g} прерывает вокс-молчание:{/n} "Да начнется ритуал единения!"

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс-передатчик{/g} в Санктум Навис улавливает шорох одежд, священные песнопения и металлические щелчки {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантов{/g}. Затем спокойный голос {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Леди-Навигатора{/g} прерывает вокс-молчание:{/n} "Да начнется ритуал единения!"

languages.text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} in the Sanctum Navis picks up the susurration of clothes, pious chanting, and the metallic clicking of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Then the serene voice of the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navigator{/g} breaks the silence:{/n} "Initiating communion ritual!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} in the Sanctum Navis picks up the susurration of clothes, pious chanting, and the metallic clicking of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Then the serene voice of the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navigator{/g} breaks the silence:{/n} "Initiating warp communion!"

Then the serene voice of the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navigator{/g} breaks the silence:{/n} "Initiating communion ritual!"

languages.text: {n}导航者圣所中的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}通讯器{/g}传来了衣服漂浮的声音、虔诚的诵经声，以及{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的金属点击声。随后，{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者女士{/g}沉静的声音打破了沉默：{/n}“开始进行圣餐仪式！”
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} in the Sanctum Navis picks up the susurration of clothes, pious chanting, and the metallic clicking of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Then the serene voice of the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navigator{/g} breaks the silence:{/n} "Initiating communion ritual!"

traits.locale_text: {n}导航者圣所中的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}通讯器{/g}传来了衣服漂浮的声音、虔诚的诵经声，以及{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的金属点击声。随后，{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者女士{/g}沉静的声音打破了沉默：{/n}“开始进行圣餐仪式！”

languages.text: {n}サンクトゥム・ネイヴィスの{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音声通信送受信装置{/g}が、衣のかすれる音、敬虔な祝詞、そして{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}の金属音を拾う。その後、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の穏やかな声が静寂を破る。{/n}「聖餐の儀式を開始いたします！」
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} in the Sanctum Navis picks up the susurration of clothes, pious chanting, and the metallic clicking of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Then the serene voice of the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navigator{/g} breaks the silence:{/n} "Initiating communion ritual!"

traits.locale_text: {n}サンクトゥム・ネイビスの{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音声通信送受信装置{/g}が、衣のかすれる音、敬虔な祝詞、そして{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}の金属音を拾う。その後、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の穏やかな声が静寂を破る。{/n}「聖餐の儀式を開始します！」
{n}サンクトゥム・ネイヴィスの{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音声通信送受信装置{/g}が、衣のかすれる音、敬虔な祝詞、そして{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}の金属音を拾う。その後、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の穏やかな声が静寂を破る。{/n}「聖餐の儀式を開始いたします！」

languages.text: {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Transmitter{/g} im Sanctum Navis registriert das Flüstern der Kleidung, die frommen Gesänge und das metallische Klicken der {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g}. Dann durchbricht die klare Stimme des {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navigators{/g} die Stille:{/n} "Leite Kommunionsritual ein!"
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} in the Sanctum Navis picks up the susurration of clothes, pious chanting, and the metallic clicking of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Then the serene voice of the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navigator{/g} breaks the silence:{/n} "Initiating communion ritual!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Transmitter{/g} im Sanctum Navis registriert das Flüstern der Kleidung, die frommen Gesänge und das metallische Klicken der {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g}. Dann durchbricht die klare Stimme des {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navigators{/g} die Stille:{/n} "Leite Kommunionsritual ein!"

languages.text: {n}L'{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}émetteur vox{/g} du sanctum navis capte une psalmodie, le doux bruissement de vêtements et le cliquetis métallique des {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Bientôt, la voix sereine de la {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}dame navigatrice{/g} brise le silence :{/n} « Initialisation du rituel de communion ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} in the Sanctum Navis picks up the susurration of clothes, pious chanting, and the metallic clicking of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Then the serene voice of the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navigator{/g} breaks the silence:{/n} "Initiating communion ritual!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}émetteur-vox{/g} du sanctum navis capte une psalmodie, le doux bruissement de vêtements et le cliquetis métallique des {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Bientôt, la voix sereine de la {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}dame navigatrice{/g} brise le silence :{/n} « Initialisation du rituel de communion ! »

languages.text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco amplificador{/g} de la Sanctum Navis detecta el susurro de la ropa, cánticos religiosos y el tintineo metálico de los {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g}. Después, la voz serena de la {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navegante{/g} rompe el silencio:{/n} «¡Iniciando el ritual de comunión!».
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} in the Sanctum Navis picks up the susurration of clothes, pious chanting, and the metallic clicking of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Then the serene voice of the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navigator{/g} breaks the silence:{/n} "Initiating communion ritual!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco amplificador{/g} de la Sanctum Navis detecta el susurro de la ropa, cánticos religiosos y el tintineo metálico de los {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g}. Después, la voz serena de la {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navegante{/g} rompe el silencio:{/n} «¡Iniciando el ritual de comunión!».

languages.text: {n}Navis Kutağı'ndaki {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksyayardan{/g} kumaş hışırtıları, candan ilahiler ve {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantların{/g} metalik tıkırtıları geliyor. Derken {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Leydi Rotacı'nın{/g} dingin sesi sükûneti bozuyor.{/n} "İştirak ayinini başlatıyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g} in the Sanctum Navis picks up the susurration of clothes, pious chanting, and the metallic clicking of {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}. Then the serene voice of the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Lady Navigator{/g} breaks the silence:{/n} "Initiating communion ritual!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Navis Kutağı'ndaki {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksyayar{/g}dan kumaş hışırtıları, candan ilahiler ve {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}ların metalik tıkırtıları geliyor. Derken {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Leydi Rotacı{/g}'nın dingin sesi sükûneti bozuyor:{/n} "İştirak ayinini başlatıyorum!"
